articles.author: Jacob Steinberg
articles.title: Chelsea owner Todd Boehly vows to bring success after completing takeover - The Guardian
articles.description: Todd Boehly promised to build on Chelsea’s ‘remarkable history of success’ after the American’s consortium completed its £4.25bn takeover
articles.content:

  • Chelsea say they received more than 250 purchase inquiries
  • Marina Granovskaia and Bruce Buck expected to stay at club

articles.title: Canada's Leylah Fernandez advances to French Open quarter-finals, Auger-Aliassime loses thriller to Nadal - CBC Sports
articles.description: There will be one Canadian in the Roland Garros singles quarter-finals this year, after Leylah Fernandez edged out American Amanda Anisimova 6-4, 3-6, 6-4 in their fourth-round match Sunday. Fellow Canadian Felix Auger-Aliassime came oh, so close to joining h…
articles.content: There will be one Canadian in the Roland Garros singles quarter-finals this year, after Leylah Fernandez edged out American Amanda Anisimova 6-4, 3-6, 6-4 in their fourth-round match Sunday in Paris,… [+6798 chars]
